section.title: Commercial Support
section.para: For services (support, consulting, development, and training) you can contact the company behind OTRS, OTRS AG. They have offices in Germany, USA, Mexico, the Netherlands and other countries. Look at their website for contact information: http://www.otrs.com/en/corporate-navigation/contact/
